text: Allakh skazal Adamu: " O Adam, soobshchi ty im nazvaniya etikh predmetov i ikh prednaznacheniye, kotorym ty nauchilsya!" A kogda on soobshchil im ikh nazvaniya, to Allakh skazal: "Razve YA vam ne govoril, chto znayu vso sokrovennoye na nebesakh i na zemle i to, chto vy obnaruzhivayete, i to, chto skryvayete v dushakh
